benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/bundles/{bundleId}/customFields - Add custom fields to bundle

covered: Valid Payload: Successful creations with valid payloads are covered by TC01, TC02, TC03, TC04, TC19, TC13.
Invalid Payload: Malformed JSON (TC08), missing required fields (TC10), empty body (TC09), empty array (TC18), duplicate field names (TC11), unsupported fields (TC12) are covered.
Boundary/Size: Large payloads (TC17) and minimum fields (TC18) are covered.
Authorization: Missing/invalid authentication (TC14) scenarios are covered.
Query Parameters: Handling of extra query parameters (TC13).
Integration/Dependency: Dependent service unavailability (TC20) and service outage (TC15) and network timeout (TC16) scenarios covered.
Security: SQL injection (TC23) and XSS (TC24) scenarios covered.
gaps: Server Error Handling: No test for 500 Internal Server Error / server-side failure (e.g., DB outage).
Authorization: Lack of test for 403 Forbidden due to insufficient privileges.
Rate Limiting: No tests to verify throttling or rate limiting behavior.
Caching Behavior: No tests checking for caching headers (ETag, Cache-Control) on POST.
Pagination: Not applicable to POST; no dedicated pagination tests; if API returns paginated results for created fields, missing.
recommendations: Add a test simulating 500 Internal Server Error to verify server error handling.
Add a 403 Forbidden scenario to ensure proper handling when the user lacks privileges.
Add rate limiting/throttling tests to validate resilience under high load.
Add tests for caching headers on POST responses if the API uses caching policies.
Clarify expectations around case sensitivity in TC21 and add explicit assertion in acceptance criteria.
Optionally add a test for idempotency in duplicate submissions across multiple requests.
